Reviews.Content: arriving novotel greeted promptly professionally front desk quickly checkedin desk clerk offered map provided instructions getting clean welllit parking garage parking 20 day extra hotel public clean inviting elevators fairly fast required keycard access upper floors little annoying nice safety feature fifth floor basic furnishings condition queen size beds night stands attached wall desk dresser couple comfortable chairs window tv standard tube set basic cable bathroom clean plenty counter space nice lighting hair dryer iron ironing board provided fridge except minibar usual overpriced items hotel offers free wireless internet signal appeared strong speed slow freezing times dont depend using wireless internet intend bed uncomfortably firm bed smallish feather pillows decorative throw pillows bed found white flat sheet barely covered mattress comforter blanket top sheet doubt comforter washed guest cant imagine guests using bed comforter warm august night air conditioning found blanket spare sheets closet remade bed top sheet blanket sheets blanket looked cheap budget motel noise hallway intrude people talking pass outside fortunately hallway visit lighting barely adequate bedside lights built headboards looked sleek reading hotel workout couple treadmills 2 elliptical trainers 2 exercise bikes stair stepper machine selection weight machines free weights substitute size gym basic workout indoor pool overall nice hotel location close yonge street st lawrence market terrific price paid competitive downtown toronto hotels feeling spent

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: piper181
Reviews.Content: gem location nice people comfy reasonable price stones throw train station myriad restaurants bars pool forgotten price pay wonderful respects toronto recommend hotel return stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location but forget the pool”
Reviews.Author: TopCats
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights 50th birthday treat found hotel clean tidy fantastic location easy walking distance major attractions city free upgrade executive top floor apart larger fancy bathroom pretty standard novotel fare breakfast excellent plenty choice museli ive tasted didnt hotel evening meals ate instead reccomend spaghetti factory opposite value frills italian meal kids families visited reception freindly helpful pool 6th floor floor changing gym pool cold un attended wife changing lights maintenance gym time didnt help light teh stay despite pool incident

Reviews.Title: “go for it”

Reviews.Content: location awesome outdoor options nearby pool indoors temp overly hot spa breakfast service hit miss amusing entertaining buffet aussie variable service standards pay fine value price stay location comfort

Reviews.Title: “Mostly okay”

Reviews.Content: location phenomenal staff polite clean halls werent particularly attractive welllit breakfast wonderful complaint ac didnt complained night hot sleep difficult checked feather pillows assured nearly pillow feathers considered luxury im allergic probably stay id demanding ac pillows

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, perfect location”
Reviews.Author: Jubsy007
Reviews.Content: spent nights beginning april perfect choice short stay toronto hotel close walked hotel staff helpful nice letdown located air conditioning units constant humming sound eventually breakfast buffet absolutely fantastic huge selection breakfast staff brilliant deal breakfast included worth

Reviews.Title: “Uggh”

Reviews.Content: hotel situated convention center hotel placed 200 hold credit card incidentals left 5 days refused print itemized bill getting reimbursement nightmare told manager busy changing clothes phone call placed hold time trying resolve hotel lobby dank odor fitness equipped pool clean stylish paint colors desk lamp plugged credenza heavy move little light reading

Reviews.Title: “Amazing!”

Reviews.Content: family 2 adults children 10 9 enjoyed hotel toronto wedding weekend lucky standard 2 double beds mistake 2 double bed explained situation staff reception understanding helpful absolutely 2 double beds standard moved class separate fine appreciated kindness staff nice slept beds comfy hotel clean appreciated food buffet morning imaginable croissants pancakes cereals toasts pastries fruits etc lunch decided skip meal breakfast dinner instead enjoyed food town hotel choices restaurants enjoyed ate chinese greek french gastronomic proximity park near downtown toronto museums tall buildings tourist attractions location overall enjoyed novotel toronto centre definitely hesitate

Reviews.Title: “Loved it”
Reviews.Author: HoHumAnotherTrip
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel extremely convenient location handy downtown harbour st lawrence market clean quiet staff helpful friendly beds comfortable heatingaircon effectively preferred royal york honest larger comfortable lot cheaper didnt eat breakfast cornflakes milk minimart 20 metres instead reception warned minibar sort technology lifted billed probably store free wireless internet coffee free bottled water extortionate wed drunk slight downside bedroom carpet little grubby

Reviews.Title: “hard to top this stay”
Reviews.Author: luvtogogirl22
Reviews.Content: reading reviews werent positive ive concluded people dont arrived toronto 3 hours posted checkin time parking upgraded immediately beautiful view greeted front desk smiles professional courtesy travel ottawa lot stay roughly price range none comfortable eyepleasing central taking advantage breakfast buffet definately worth thanks
